website_summaries.verdict: This kit comes with everything you need to get started making kombucha, including a recipe book and customer support.
pros: Tea, cane sugar, a brewing jar, pH strips, and a certified organic SCOBY add to this being a comprehensive and helpful starter kit
cons: Some complaints on the quality of the kit contents upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Best Kombucha Kit You’ll Find!
customer_reviews.text: This product was phenomenal! You won’t find a better kit out there. By no means am I an expert but I’ve tried other products and none of them were as enjoyable to use or as quality of a product. Would recommend this to anyone looking to get into Kombucha brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Eckstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not a starter
customer_reviews.text: To brew, the liquid must be kept between 75 and 80. The kit did not mention a heater is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Resipso

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s good but...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend but it came as a box of glass shards... it’s as I feared, that something like this should be bought in person and not online due to its fragile nature. I’d recommend finding this in a store to check out and bring home. That being said, I am still very excited to one day attempt to brew our own. Until then...
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with everything to start. I had some questions as the kombucha was in process so I called the company that it comes from. They were very helpful. After 2 weeks and 3 days we bottled and flavored then 2 days later, Voila! Just like magic. 2 no batch is fermenting now.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: The complete Kombucha Brewing starter kit is exactly what it says it is. Contents arrived safely and in full. Instructions easy to follow. The only thing some people may have to get is a heat pad to keep the temperature stable, bottles, and a jug for pouring the Kombucha...all easy to get. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Kombucha it to me.
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with a scoby, sugar, tea, ph strips, one gallon wide mouth jar for fermentation, dry erase marker, pipette, and cheese cloth to cover the jar. Kit is simple enough to use. Instructions are clear and concise. They give you good recipes for flavoring. I recommend using non chlorinated water. If you know you enjoy kombucha you might consider buying a kit with a bigger jar. So far we have done 3 batches. With each batch the scoby is getting bigger and the fermentation process is going faster. Everything in kit is function is I expected. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tea to brew kombucha with!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my original kombucha brewing starter kit from fermentaholics and really liked the way it came out with the tea that was provided. After having no luck with other teas that I’ve gotten from the store, I decided to get some more of the tea that came with my starter kit. My most recent batch turned out beautifully! It tastes great and provides a good base flavor to add on to.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Mold?
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions exactly but when it was time to bottle, I saw brown / black tendrils draping from the new SCOBY. Looks like jellyfish tendrils. I can only assume that this is bad, and not comfortable trying to reuse the SCOBY. Also now the return window has expired, so I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: roger jones

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose them
customer_reviews.text: I have only great things to say about this product. I highly recommend it for anyone getting started. They have really made it easy and I’m really glad I chose them. If you live in cooler temps, I recommend buying a heating pad for brewing, which doesn’t come with the kit. They also have excellent customer support. I messaged them from their website, which is loaded with tips. I just had some questions about my brew and they addressed them all. I really like their whole branding too, from a designer’s perspective. They just have made this experience very simple and I feel confident about brewing my next batch.
customer_reviews.author: Neal S.

customer_reviews.title: This kit is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was so easy to use! It was my first time making kombucha and I had no issues whatsoever. I’ve been making it weekly ever since. The instructions are very user friendly, and the transition from first-time maker to second-time (and 3rd, etc.) was seamless.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. It really comes with everything to get you started. The scoby was so healthy and has given me great baby scobies! If you are starting out, may I suggest purchasing swing top glass bottles and a brew siphon too. It will make the second fermentation much easier!
customer_reviews.author: MsLasha

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions and works amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just started my second ferment! My SCOBY grew so big!!! This is awesome! I’m not new to making kombucha but it’s been years since I have. I think this has been my best batch. Easy instructions, everything plus some needed included! Can’t wait til next week to see how much my SCOBY grows again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: the packaging was fantastic, the kit and directions were very easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: the packaging was fantastic, the kit and directions were very easy to use and understand. Future uses are also very easy. I love it! I will be purchasing at least 1 more kit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING YOU NEED!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for starting out! We absolutely love watching our kombucha evolve & grow! Thank you so much for putting every in one easy kit with easy instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Wharry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It comes with everything you need and gives you directions on how to keep brewing. I've been using the jar for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get started and feel confident in the process comes with the kit. Very easy to follow directions!
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Kombucha Brewing Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for brewing Kombucha from tea. Works great ,easy to use, add it and put the tea away for two weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: William Lettich

customer_reviews.title: This company is awesome!  Kombucha kit was exactly as described.  I’m super happy!
customer_reviews.text: This company's products are exactly what they claim to be! I was so surprised to get my kombucha kit and start making it. The scoby was pristine!!! My first fermentation came out awesome! My F2 EVEN BETTER! I’ll be a repeat customer for sure
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Came on time . Well packaged...Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for those starting out!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. Everything you need to get started brewing kombucha. Easy to read and understand directions. Had questions the second day of brewing and customer service is very friendly and helpful. Can’t rate the taste as I am only on the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good instructions. Just finished our first batch of kombucha and am very pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions for making Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Kit with everything you need to start making Kombucha at home.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Good so far, didn’t receive pH strips
customer_reviews.text: I just started the process now, everything looks good this far. The only thing is I did not receive the pH strips with my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pysher

customer_reviews.title: Is Complete Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: The product came with everything I needed to make Kombucha. I just had to get some filtered water, then follow the simple instructions, and I am now just waiting for the tea to ferment.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Trias

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good price
customer_reviews.text: 9nd day baby SCOBY floating on top and mama SCOBY sank to the bottom several days earlier. Taste good already but will wait a few more days for stronger fermentation. Great product. Arrived as expected and everything went well. Need to find another jar for the SCOBY hotel now :)
customer_reviews.author: H2O

customer_reviews.title: Kombuholic
customer_reviews.text: Fermentaholics, you have made me an alcoholic to Kombucha! Loved the self explanatory instructions. Products are great to work with. Common sense in most of the process until my desire taste was acquired. Loved how a new culture developed like magic. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MRS. ALICIA VOISIN

customer_reviews.title: Feeling great
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to make and delicious to drink, every day. You just feel better all over.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret mcCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Loved the top quality of this product. I also loved the detail instructions of how start but also keep brewing!! This company has also been very helpful with answering questions.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The first product had parts missing. The change was according the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Try brewing Kombucha; it's easy.
customer_reviews.text: It's still in progress but was very easy to prepare. Looking forward to seeing flavors.
customer_reviews.author: CAMILLE KOTCHENREUTER

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Everything you need with easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but smells like sulfur, had to return.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first batch of booch. I followed the directions to a T and the batch tastes great but smells a little like sulfur. I used bottled water so it’s not from that. I’d like to get a new scoby and starter brew sent to me instead of returning this but I don’t know how to do it. Seller - please help! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: minkalue

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Packed with plenty of styrofoam. Everything was packed inside the jar. Nice 8 1/2 x 11 instructions with some flavoring recipes on the back. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: JTPK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starting point for brewing
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions given, and came out with delicious kombucha! This kit came with everything I needed, and very easy to follow directions. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to start making kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to brew your first batch of Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. If this is your first time trying to make Kombucha, ensure you do so successfully by buying this kit. It has the highest probability of you brewing a successful batch of kombucha. After you get another good scoby goig with this kit, then you can experiment with other types of teas, containers, and volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Darnell Arford

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time home brewers
customer_reviews.text: Needed a quarantine project, and this was perfect. The kit comes with everything needed for the first batch and the instructions are easy to follow. It also has some great recommendations for secondary fermentation. I tried the Strawberry Mint Lemonade, and it's a hit with the wife and kiddo. I'm already a week into my second batch, amd happy with the progress so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cptn Tom Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I have made two batches so far and so far so good. The heating band is helpful as would not be able to maintain the 75-85 temperature without it.
customer_reviews.author: Obrewer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this kit. Everything about it was great. The instructions were easy to follow and repeat with your own ingredients... until the glass jar just randomly broke. I hand washed it and set it on a drying pad at night (not in direct sunlight) and it made a huge popping noise. The entire bottom blew out.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Step by step instructions make it easy for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are very easy to follow and my kombucha tastes great and I love it! You can add flavor to it but it’s good enough to drink even plain.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I am not the recipient but it makes amazing kombucha! My husband really enjoyed making the kombucha and it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: UKtsb

customer_reviews.title: Brew your own kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. All you need is the seal-able bottles. Recipes included. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time brewers!
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with everything you need to start. The directions were clear and easy to follow. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for family and they were so pleased with the quality and results!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: what to make it? make the gallon.  one quart systems are pointless
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. comes with everything you need to make a gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Dallmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit
customer_reviews.text: The package has everything you need to make kombucha. I particularly like the manual inside which I now use every time I brew kombucha
customer_reviews.author: Texas 2000

customer_reviews.title: Complete starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived fast and was complete. Started brewing a few days later, and am on my third batch now.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Inman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Kombucha starter kit! I cannot recommend it enough- it has everything you could ever want for brewing kombucha! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Complete Kombucha Brewing Starter Kit | Fermentaholics USDA Certified Organic Kit (The Complete Kombucha Brewing Starter Kit)
feature_bullets: THE COMPLETE ORGANIC KOMBUCHA KIT INCLUDES – Everything you need to start a 1-gallon batch of kombucha - Kombucha Starter Culture (SCOBY- 12 fl oz of mature starter tea with pellicle), 1-Gallon Brew Jar, Organic Cane Sugar, Tea Blend, Re-usable Cotton Tea Bag, Adhesive Thermometer, pH strips, pipette, Cotton Cloth Cover, Rubber Band, Detailed Instructions and Flavoring Guide!
USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC & KOSHER – Our kits are certified Organic & OU Kosher including our Classic Kombucha Starter Culture (SCOBY), Organic Cane Sugar and our Original Kombucha Tea Blend.

GLASS JAR & BREATHABLE COVER –Glass jars make a great vessel for brewing kombucha. You can watch the visual changes that occur during the fermentation, clean up easy, and write notes in the fun “brewing notes” section printed on our jars. A breathable cover helps provide oxygen for your SCOBY during the primary fermentation while helping to keep bugs out.
EASY TO FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS: Our detailed, step-by-step instructions are designed by kombucha brewers to help address any questions you may have during your first brew.
OUR MISSION IS YOUR SUCCESS—Our team of fermentation fanatics is just a phone call (or email) away. We have your back and are ready and equipped to help lead to you to success.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
